Chapter 3 Data transformation We download the code from https://grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/. It has filtered for extracting user with multiple ratings[>=20]. The following Code can be used for download data. Note: [Recommended RAM >= 24G] system(“wget https://files.grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/ml-25m.zip”) system(“unzip https://files.grouplens.org/datasets/movielens/ml-25m.zip”)
